item.title: Comment on Chocstravagant! by Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Sasha,
Sorry I've been AWOL for a little while and just spotted this. The cake would feed at least 20 I would say. I haven't done heaps of chocolate work either, but I would say for anyone wanting to do something like this for an occasion it's worth having a go at tempering with a small batch of chocolate. The main thing is to open the windows - it's so much easier in a cold environment.
Hope your cousin liked her cake! Katie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Sasha,

Sorry I’ve been AWOL for a little while and just spotted this. The cake would feed at least 20 I would say. I haven’t done heaps of chocolate work either, but I would say for anyone wanting to do something like this for an occasion it’s worth having a go at tempering with a small batch of chocolate. The main thing is to open the windows – it’s so much easier in a cold environment.

Hope your cousin liked her cake!
Katie

item.title: Comment on Carved from stone by Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Dee,
Yes I see no reason this wouldn't work with transparent cases. The ones I used were different types of plastic and they both worked really well.
Happy crafting! Katie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Dee,

Yes I see no reason this wouldn’t work with transparent cases. The ones I used were different types of plastic and they both worked really well.

Happy crafting!
Katie

item.title: Comment on Stack ’em high! by Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Kay,
Sorry just spotted this! The ones I bought were in multipacks of 3, but that's the beauty of this recipe - if you have a little too much you can add more rice krispies and vice versa!
Hope you enjoyed them! Katie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Kay,

Sorry just spotted this! The ones I bought were in multipacks of 3, but that’s the beauty of this recipe – if you have a little too much you can add more rice krispies and vice versa!

Hope you enjoyed them!
Katie

item.title: Comment on Stack ’em high! by Kay wood
item.dc:creator: Kay wood
item.description: Hi Thare Just about to embark on these yummy looking tray bakes. What sdo zen mars bars do you use I.e weight, seems to be a lot of different sizes in supermarket. Many Thanks Kay
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Comment on Carved from stone by Dee
item.dc:creator: Dee
item.description: Will this work with transparent cases?

item.title: Comment on Chocstravagant! by Sasha
item.dc:creator: Sasha
item.description:
Hi this cake looks fabulous I'm thinking if making this for my cousins 40th birthday party, how many people did it feed?
I might do a black forest version though as it's her favourite.
Is it worth practising the chocolate work first as don't want to mess it up. I do bake quite often but nothing with chocolate work. Thanks Sasha
item.content:encoded:
Hi this cake looks fabulous I’m thinking if making this for my cousins 40th birthday party, how many people did it feed?

I might do a black forest version though as it’s her favourite.

Is it worth practising the chocolate work first as don’t want to mess it up. I do bake quite often but nothing with chocolate work.
Thanks Sasha
